title: Plain sailing
creator_credit: Film Australia, Robin Hughes and Martin Cohen
brief_description: Designed to assist the small businessman by emphasising the necessity of a thorough knowledge and planning before embarking on a business venture. Describes some of the do’s and don’ts that can make or break a business.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Robin Hughes and Martin Cohen
